author: Special Correspondent
text:
Arrested for murder of college student

Police on Thursday arrested six youth in connection with the murder of a presidency college student on January 3.

According to police, B. Srinivasan, was attacked following an altercation on New Year’s eve.

He died in the hospital early on Wednesday morning.

Subsequently, police arrested Devalingam, Vishal, Divakar, Veera, Tamil Selvan and Divakar in connection with the murder.

They were later remanded in judicial custody.- Special Correspondent
title: 07JANVKN03 – Crime fillers/ Arrested for murder of college student
